fields.name: Inspiration:
fields.value:
Duwii being inspired by Town of Salem 2
Attack: None (Powerful)
Defense: Basic

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, learn the name of a player with a Town role. They are now your target.
- If your target dies from any means other than execution, you become a Jester (Post 4797)
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the Daily Streak faction, you instead choose a player to make your target, and you gain a Powerful attack to use each night once your target is executed.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get your target executed by any means necessary
